name: Running To The Dead
description:
Hi my friend and welcome to "Running to the dead"!

please, be nice this is my very first game!

I hope you will enjoy yourself and rage as much as you can!

Controls :

to move up : the up arrow key

to move down : the down arrow key

to kill zombies : space bar

but in the options menu you can change that as you wish !

Music:

the game's music does not belong to me but comes from Marcelo Fernandez !

If you like it, don't hesitate to tell him here and give him a small donation :

https://marcelofernandezmusic.itch.io/action-music-pack

Thanks to you from OctoDice Studio!
